result.adr_address: Linway Court, 69-71 Stone Nullah Ln, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Linway Court, 69-71 Stone Nullah Ln, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: 鋒膳 Flower Drum

reviews.text: Lunch on Saturday,  daily special Yellow fish pan fried to crispy remains fresh.   Noodle a bit soft.  Baked pork chop rice kept up with standard.

This place was hidden away on the 2nd floor next to my favorite Thai restaurant. My buddy brought wines and they knew which glasses to use! I didn't know the difference between burgundy and Bordeaux glasses! Went for lunch and I would recommend the simple stuffs. Roast pork with 2 eggs looked good. Went for fancy abalone and fried rice and it was good but 288 was pricey. Staffs were super nice! Press 2B at the gate for entrance!
Tried lunch a few times and dinner once.  The food is of superb quality but the price is also upscale. Lunch sets offering noodles or rice are more economical. The roast pork is a must try.
Taste good and you must try.
Great food,  good service and choice of music.  Will visit again definitely.

result.vicinity: Linway Court, 69-71 Stone Nullah Lane, Wan Chai

I didn't know the difference between burgundy and Bordeaux glasses! Went for lunch and I would recommend the simple stuffs. Roast pork with 2 eggs looked good. Went for fancy abalone and fried rice and it was good but 288 was pricey. Staffs were super nice! Press 2B at the gate for entrance!
Tried lunch a few times and dinner once.  The food is of superb quality but the price is also upscale. Lunch sets offering noodles or rice are more economical. The roast pork is a must try.
Taste good and you must try.
Great food,  good service and choice of music.  Will visit again definitely.

result.adr_address: 香港灣仔石水渠街69-71號年威閣
result.formatted_address: 香港灣仔石水渠街69-71號年威閣
result.name: 鋒膳 Flower Drum

reviews.text: 朋友帶我來試過一次他們的午市套餐就愛上了這裡!!! 很多人看來是頗昂貴的碟頭飯，但其實套餐配上了一碗爵士湯，平時一碗也要一百幾十啦，那這個價格又不算真的那麼高昂喎！最緊要係真材實料，味道也相當不錯，唔想同人逼，來這裡是個不錯的選擇呀！另外，因為是碟頭飯的原因，一個人來吃也可以啊，是想嘆住食既"孤獨精" 的午膳天堂呀！☺
Lunch on Saturday,  daily special Yellow fish pan fried to crispy remains fresh.   Noodle a bit soft.  Baked pork chop rice kept up with standard.
開業一年多，位處較偏僻的小區，午市以特價套餐作號召，號稱賣全港最貴的义燒飯、焗豬扒飯。但套餐包括鮮甜美味的爵士湯，這天我點的豬扒是日本豬，食材高水準，其實也不算貴。值得再次來訪！午市時間也全廳客滿，應該也能說明一切。

This place was hidden away on the 2nd floor next to my favorite Thai restaurant. My buddy brought wines and they knew which glasses to use! I didn't know the difference between burgundy and Bordeaux glasses! Went for lunch and I would recommend the simple stuffs. Roast pork with 2 eggs looked good. Went for fancy abalone and fried rice and it was good but 288 was pricey. Staffs were super nice! Press 2B at the gate for entrance!

Outside may look ghetto but don't let it's appearance deceive you, overall a decent 私房菜 private dining, BBQ pork Cha siu, 琵琶燒乳鴿 roasted pigeon, 酸菜東星斑 sour and spicy pickle fish are one of the best in town.

result.vicinity: 灣仔石水渠街69-71號年威閣
